original_title: La chute de la maison Usher
overview: After a long journey, Alain arrives at the Usher mansion to visit his old friend, Roderick Usher. Upon arriving, however, he discovers that Roderick and his sister, Madeline, have been afflicted with a mysterious malady: Roderick's senses have become painfully acute, while Madeline has become nearly catatonic.

production_companies.name: Corporación Mexicana de Radio y Televisión

title: The Fall of the House of Usher
